post_title: FS (another big reduction) - T206 John Frill Tolstoi SGC graded, very low population
post_content: For Sale (Another Big Price Reduction) - T206 John Frill, Tolstoi graded SGC 1.  Very difficult to find subject with Tolstoi back.  The PSA population report shows only 3 graded.  $275 venmo no fee or $282.50 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
